properties.name: multiple
properties.desc: `True` will turn the control into multiselect.

properties.name: id-string
properties.desc: The name of property for id.

properties.name: value-string
properties.desc: The name of property for value.

properties.name: min-chars
properties.desc: The minimum number of characters to enter in typeahead for searching.

properties.name: delay
properties.desc: The waiting period before starting the search.

properties.name: container-css-classes
properties.desc: CSS classes attached to the dropdown container.
